modelVotes: {"statement":"Add (k+1)","equation_steps":[{"equation":"∑[j=0 to k] j^2 + (k+1)^2 = ∑[j=0 to k+1] j^2","explanation":""},{"equation":"1/6 k(k+1)(2k+1) + (k+1)^2","explanation":""},{"equation":"(k+1) (1/6 (2k+1)k + (k+1))","explanation":"","highlighted_terms":["1/6 (2k+1)k","(k+1)"]},{"equation":"1/6 (k+1) (2k^2 + k + 6(k+1))","explanation":"","highlighted_terms":["2k^2 + k","6(k+1)"]},{"equation":"1/6 (k+1) (k+2) (2k+3)","explanation":"","highlighted_term":"1/6 (k+1) (k+2) (2k+3)"}]}
